DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , non-interventional , monocentric observational study pharmacokinetic property select antiinfective drug sustain low-efficiency dialysis ( SLED ) analyze . Plasma specimens quantify use high Performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) . Primary endpoint : Plasma level antiinfectives SLED Secondary endpoint : - 28-day-mortality - length stay intensive care unit ( ICU ) hospital - clinical microbiological cure infection Inclusion criterion : - age : > 18 year - patient SLED - antiinfective treatment exclusion criterion : - miss informed consent
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Selected Antiinfectives During Sustained Low-efficiency Dialysis ( SLED )
DOC.criteria: age : 18 old patient receive SLED either meropenem ceftazidim miss inform consent
